Properties.Description: In what language did you translate?

Properties.Name: Contact
Properties.Description:
How can you be contacted If there are more questions open?
Write down your Discord#0000 or Skype Name or E-Mail Address.

Properties.Name: Nickname
Properties.Description:
What is your nickname?
I need it to mention you in the changelog that everyone knows you are the translator of this language.
